prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, (imposing purple-skinned feline deity:1.2), slender humanoid anatomy, (weathered Sphynx cat skin texture:1.3), piercing glowing yellow eyes, stern expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed epidermal wrinkles, (organic skin imperfections:1.2), subtle biological sheen, individual fine whiskers, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching silk fabric texture on robes:1.2), subsurface scattering on large ears, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, human face, human nose, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (furry:1.2), flat lighting
